summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help the federal government save money, address issues on our High Risk List, and significantly improve government operations. This letter to USAID outlines 4 open recommendations that it should prioritize. For example, we recommended that the agency ensure its guidance requires fraud assessments for its programs. title: Priority Open Recommendations: U.S. Agency for International Development
